The tweet by Delhi MLA Manjinder S Sirsa: affiliated Shiromani Akali Dal (SAD) claiming that the photograph shows Nehru being kissed by a lady from behind.
The debunking of the image by Alt News: which clarified that the woman kissing Nehru is his niece Nayantara Sehgal and the woman on their right is Sehgal's mother, Vijaylakshmi Pandit.
The video posted by vintage television c: which provides a clearer context of Nehru's arrival and shows the peck at the 27th second of the clip.
The circulation of a purported photograp: which was later revealed to be a shot from a play called 'Drawing the Line' featuring theatre actor Silas Carson and actress Lucy Black.
